name: assign_space_type_by_space_name
display_name: Assign Space Type by Space Name

arguments.name: search_string
arguments.display_name: String ot search for in space names

arguments.name: space_type
arguments.display_name: Space type to assign to affected spaces

arguments.name: skip_already_assigned
arguments.display_name: Skip spaces that already have hard assigned space types

modeler_description: When using this make sure the search string is specific enough so you don't inadvertently change other spaces. The search is case sensitive.
description: Assign space type to spaces with names that include a user defined string. Optionally skip over spaces that already have space types assigned directly to the space.
